Text.Page:
Lumikan was defeated, but Vergos' Legacy was destroyed.

For her efforts in stopping Lumikan from destroying Arborea with you, Hasmina received Seir's recognition.
Lumikan was stopped, but it is regrettable that the relic was destroyed.

You accomplished your task admirably.

From now on, I will give Hasmina my full support.

I hope you will help too.
